TypeSignature.Value: public sealed class DataTableMappingCollection : MarshalByRefObject, System.Collections.IList, System.Data.ITableMappingCollection

.class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit DataTableMappingCollection extends System.MarshalByRefObject implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable, class System.Collections.IList, class System.Data.ITableMappingCollection

Attribute.AttributeName: System.ComponentModel.Editor("Microsoft.VSDesigner.Data.Design.DataTableMappingCollectionEditor, Microsoft.VSDesigner, Version=10.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a", "System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor, System.Drawing, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a")

Docs.summary: A collection of <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping"> objects. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Examples The following example uses an <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter> to <xref:System.Data.Common.DataTableMappingCollection.Add%2A><xref:System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping> objects to its <xref:System.Data.Common.DataAdapter.TableMappings%2A> collection, and then displays a list of those mapped source tables. This example assumes that an <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter> has already been created.
[!CODE [Classic WebData DataTableMappingCollection Example#1](../CodeSnippet/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DataTableMappingCollection Example#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DataTableMappingCollection"> class. This new instance is empty, that is, it does not yet contain any <xref:System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping> objects.

remarks.format:
## Examples The following example creates a <xref:System.Data.Common.DataTableMappingCollection>, adds <xref:System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping> objects to the collection, and displays a list of the mapped source tables.
[!CODE [Classic WebData DataTableMappingCollection.DataTableMappingCollection Example#1](../CodeSnippet/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DataTableMappingCollection.DataTableMappingCollection Example#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance int32 Add(object value) cil managed

Docs.param: A `DataTableMapping` object to add to the collection.
Docs.summary: Adds an <see cref="T:System.Object"> that is a table mapping to the collection.
Docs.returns: The index of the `DataTableMapping` object added to the collection.

remarks.format:
## Examples The following example searches for a <xref:System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping> within the collection. If the mapping exists in the collection, it is removed. If the mapping does not exist within the collection, it is added to the collection and its index is displayed. The example assumes that a <xref:System.Data.Common.DataTableMappingCollection> collection and a <xref:System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping> object have been created.
[!CODE [Classic WebData DataTableMappingCollection.Add Example#1](../CodeSnippet/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DataTableMappingCollection.Add Example#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping Add (string sourceTable, string dataSetTable);
.method public hidebysig instance class System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping Add(string sourceTable, string dataSetTable) cil managed

Docs.param: The case-sensitive name of the source table to map from.
The name, which is not case-sensitive, of the <see cref="T:System.Data.DataSet"> table to map to.
Docs.summary: Adds a <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping"> object to the collection when given a source table name and a <xref:System.Data.DataSet> table name.
Docs.returns: The <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping"> object that was added to the collection.

remarks.format:

[!CODE [Classic WebData DataTableMappingCollection.DataTableMappingCollection Example#1](../CodeSnippet/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DataTableMappingCollection.DataTableMappingCollection Example#1)]

remarks.format:
## Examples The following example uses the <xref:System.Data.Common.DataTableMappingCollection.CopyTo%2A> method to export the collection to an array of <xref:System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping> objects. It then clears the collection, and returns `true` if the parameters are no longer persisting. This example assumes that a <xref:System.Data.Common.DataTableMappingCollection> has already been created.
[!CODE [Classic WebData DataTableMappingCollection.Clear Example#1](../CodeSnippet/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DataTableMappingCollection.Clear Example#1)]

If the mapping does not exist within the collection, it is added to the collection and its index is displayed. remarks.format:

If the <xref:System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping> exists, the example displays the name and the index of the mapping. If the mapping does not exist, the example displays an error. This example assumes that a <xref:System.Data.Common.DataTableMappingCollection> collection has been created.
[!CODE [Classic WebData DataTableMappingCollection.this1 Example#1](../CodeSnippet/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DataTableMappingCollection.this1 Example#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping GetTableMappingBySchemaAction (System.Data.Common.DataTableMappingCollection tableMappings, string sourceTable, string dataSetTable, System.Data.MissingMappingAction mappingAction);

.method public static hidebysig class System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping GetTableMappingBySchemaAction(class System.Data.Common.DataTableMappingCollection tableMappings, string sourceTable, string dataSetTable, valuetype System.Data.MissingMappingAction mappingAction) cil managed

Docs.param: The <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DataTableMappingCollection"> collection to search.
The case-sensitive name of the mapped source table.
The name, which is not case-sensitive, of the mapped <see cref="T:System.Data.DataSet"> table.
One of the <see cref="T:System.Data.MissingMappingAction"> values.
Docs.summary: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DataColumnMapping"> object with the specified source table name and <xref:System.Data.DataSet> table name, using the given <xref:System.Data.MissingMappingAction>.

remarks.format:
## Remarks If the <xref:System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping> exists in the collection, it is returned.
If the <xref:System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping> does not exist in the collection for a given <xref:System.Data.MissingMappingAction>, the following happens:
|MissingMappingAction|Action taken| |--------------------------|------------------| |`Passthrough`|Creates a <xref:System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping> object with the given as the source table name and as the <xref:System.Data.DataSet> table name. The created <xref:System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping> object is not added to the collection.| |`Error`|An exception is generated. The parameter is ignored.| |`Ignore`|Gets `null`. The parameter is ignored.|
## Examples The following example searches for a <xref:System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping> with the given source table name within the collection. If the object exists, it is returned. The example assumes that a <xref:System.Data.Common.DataTableMappingCollection> collection and a <xref:System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping> object have been created.
[!CODE [Classic WebData DataTableMappingCollection.GetTableMappingBySchemaAction Example#1](../CodeSnippet/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DataTableMappingCollection.GetTableMappingBySchemaAction Example#1)]
